home.title: Welcome to Pokereact!
home.description: Pokereact is a React project that allows you to display a list of Pokemon. It is based on the Pokenode API.
home.secondaryDescription: The Pokenode API is a REST API that allows you to retrieve data from the Pokemon database. It is a free service, so you can use it for your own purposes. <1>https://pokeapi.co/</1>
home.link: Go to the <1>Pokedex</1> page to see the list of Pokemon.
